Module schach
Package schach.view

Class ChessBoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • schach.view.ChessBoardController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChessBoardComputer, ChessBoardHuman
    public abstract class ChessBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that contains functions to handle the gui chessboard representation

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void checkForMove​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane lastClickedPane)
      Called if a Pane was clicked and there is a valid piece chosen: inMove Checks if the last clicked pane represents a legal square the toBeMoved piece can be moved to if so calls move method, otherwise calls paneClicked method
      protected void clearAndUpdateHistory()
      Clears the history list and and adds all states to the list again
      private void colorLegals​(Piece piece)
      Colors the legalSquares of a given piece
      protected boolean correctTurn​(Piece clickedPiece)
      checks if its the right turn
      protected void doPromotion​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
      called if mouse clicked on pane in the promotion grid Executes the promotion by getting the pathname of the image displayed in the pane and converting it to a pawn.doPromotion call
      protected void gameOver()
      Called if Checkmate displays overlay with game over message
      private void initEventHandler()
      initializes the event handler for the stackpanes on the board and for promotion grids
      private void initHashMap()
      initializes the two hashmaps assigning Squares to StackPane and vice versa
      protected boolean isPromotion​(Piece piece)
      Checks if promotion is valid
      protected abstract void move​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane lastClickedPane)
      calls the board.movePiece method and calls the print method checks for promotion and checkmate
      private void paneClicked​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
      Called if a Pane was clicked and there is not valid piece chosen Colors the pane and checks if there is a valid piece on the pane
      private void placeImageOnPane​(Piece piece, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
      Places image of a wanted piece on a StackPane via a ImageView
      protected void printBoard()
      'Draws' the Chess Board by getting the positioning of the board, iterating over all active piece and displaying the belonging image in the belonging StackPane
      abstract void redo()
      redoes the last undone move
      protected void resetBackground()
      Resets the background color of all StackPanes in the BoardGrid to grey/white
      void rotateGame()
      Start a new thread rotating the chess board using transitions

      setter for clock controller
      void setMultipleSelect​(boolean multipleSelect)
      setter to toggle the multiple selection function
      void setPossibleMoves​(boolean newValue)
      Setter to toggle if possible moves are shown or not
      void setRotate​(java.lang.Boolean rotate)
      Interface to toggle the rotate function
      void setShowIsCheck​(boolean newBool)
      Sets the information to visible if a player is in check
      protected void showPromotion​(boolean whiteProm)
      displays the PromotionGrid and disables the mouse events on the board grid

      Undoes the selected move

      'Converts' a unicode of a piece to the belonging image

      private java.lang.String unicodeToPathWhite​(java.lang.String unicode)

      • isPromotion

        protected boolean isPromotion​(Piece piece)
        Checks if promotion is valid
        Parameters:
        piece - the promotion should be checked for
        Returns:
        true if promotion will executed, false if no promotion possible

      • showPromotion

        protected void showPromotion​(boolean whiteProm)
        displays the PromotionGrid and disables the mouse events on the board grid
        Parameters:
        whiteProm - true if promotion for white, false if promotion for black

      • doPromotion

        protected void doPromotion​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
        called if mouse clicked on pane in the promotion grid Executes the promotion by getting the pathname of the image displayed in the pane and converting it to a pawn.doPromotion call
        Parameters:
        pane - the Pane in a Promotion grid clicked on

        protected void printBoard()
        'Draws' the Chess Board by getting the positioning of the board, iterating over all active piece and displaying the belonging image in the belonging StackPane

        Returns:
